channel.title: MTP V3 - The Best Pking Server
channel.description:
[IMG]http://img109.imageshack.us/img109/2068/mtp12.th.png[/img] [URL=http://img90.imageshack.us/i/mtp11.png/][IMG]http://img90.imageshack.us/img90/8178/mtp11.th.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://img143.imageshack.us/i/mtp10.png/][IMG]http://img143.imageshack.us/img143/2461/mtp10.th.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://img89.imageshack.us/i/mtp9.png/][IMG]http://img89.imageshack.us/img89/6758/mtp9.th.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://img703.imageshack.us/i/mtp8.png/][IMG]http://img703.imageshack.us/img703/2628/mtp8.th.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://img814.imageshack.us/i/mtp7.png/][IMG]http://img814.imageshack.us/img814/803/mtp7.th.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://img266.imageshack.us/i/mtp6s.png/][IMG]http://imageshack.us/thumbnmail.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://img17.imageshack.us/i/mtp5.png/][IMG]http://img17.imageshack.us/img17/9896/mtp5.th.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://img838.imageshack.us/i/mtp4.png/][IMG]http://imageshack.us/thumbnmail.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://img819.imageshack.us/i/mtp3.png/][IMG]http://img819.imageshack.us/img819/252/mtp3.th.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://img217.imageshack.us/i/mtp2.png/][IMG]http://img217.imageshack.us/img217/1374/mtp2.th.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://img819.imageshack.us/i/mtp1.png/][IMG]http://img819.imageshack.us/img819/3421/mtp1.th.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://img156.imageshack.us/i/mtp0.png/][IMG]http://img156.imageshack.us/img156/1344/mtp0.th.png[/img][/URL]
I have lots of ideas for the future and Could use some help and testers. I currently host and code it but I Vain I is going to be helping me out. I could use another very experienced coder, not someone who thinks they know alot. I also could use some staff on the server to help manage and all beta testers will be welcome. If you are interested in testing, being staff, or coding you can post here or message me.
The server also has a webclient or a dlable client. If you want the webclient link, I do not want to post it until it is approved but you may message me for it.
